metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17783 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In GraphicsMagick 1.3.27a, there is a buffer over-read in ReadPALMImage in coders/palm.c when QuantumDepth is 8.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.27-2
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.27-2
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.27-2
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.27-2
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.27-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.27-2').
